org.cloudsimplus.listeners

Class HostToVmEventInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudsimplus.listeners.EventInfoSimple
      • org.cloudsimplus.listeners.VmEventInfoSimple
        • org.cloudsimplus.listeners.HostToVmEventInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventInfo, HostEventInfo, VmEventInfo

    public class HostToVmEventInfo
extends VmEventInfoSimple
implements HostEventInfo
    An EventInfo class that stores data to be passed to Vm's EventListener objects that are registered to be notified about events of a Vm that happened inside a given Host. So it represents the data of the notification passed from a Host to a Vm. This class can be used to notify observers when a Host is allocated or deallocated to a given Vm, when a Vm has its processing updated by its Host, etc.
    Since:
    CloudSim Plus 1.0
    Author:
    Manoel Campos da Silva Filho
    See Also:
    Vm.getOnHostAllocationListener(), Vm.getOnHostDeallocationListener(), Vm.getOnUpdateVmProcessingListener()
